entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
